task: Create a beautifully decorated garden setting with fresh flowers, soft lighting, and elegant seating for an intimate and romantic wedding ceremony.

department.Designing: Curate floral arrangements and garden-themed decor.

task: Serve a carefully curated multi-course meal featuring the couple’s favorite cuisines, paired with signature cocktails and a decadent dessert station.

department.Catering: Plan and serve a menu suitable for the theme.

task: Arrange a live band for the ceremony and dinner, followed by a DJ playing an energetic mix of music to keep guests dancing all night.

department.Coordination: Manage the event timeline and logistics.

department.Entertainment: Install and manage sound and stage setup.

department.Photo and Video: Organize professional photography and videography services.

task: Capture every special moment with high-quality photography and videography, including a pre-wedding shoot and candid guest interactions.

department.Designing: Curate floral arrangements and garden-themed decor.

department.Photo and Video: Organize professional photography and videography services.

task: Provide professional hair and makeup services for the couple and wedding party, ensuring everyone looks flawless for the big day.

department.Coordination: Manage the event timeline and logistics.

department.Hair and Makeup: Style hair and apply makeup for the bridal party.
